lines_and_colors: Bound a Trouble - and Lives will bear it -
Still to anticipate - Were no limit -
State it the Ages - to a cipher -
And it will ache contented on -
Sing, at it's pain, as any Workman -
Notching the fall of the even Sun -
document.title: Bound a trouble
document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
